title: Hermez11
author: Hermez11
content: Hi everyone. I'm offering some of my art pieces. Times has changed and trials and tribulations for this starving artist so it's time to release my art to the masses.https://tinypic.host/image/photo-1-2023-09-07-00-53-15.jDCMOhttps://tinypic.host/image/photo-2-2023-09-07-00-53-15.jD3DMhttps://tinypic.host/image/photo-3-2023-09-07-00-53-15.jD5fkhttps://tinypic.host/image/photo-4-2023-09-07-00-53-15.jDGTmhttps://tinypic.host/image/photo-5-2023-09-07-00-53-15.jDaRvhttps://tinypic.host/image/photo-6-2023-09-07-00-53-15.jDgZwhttps://tinypic.host/image/photo-7-2023-09-07-00-53-15.jDvaahttps://tinypic.host/image/photo-8-2023-09-07-00-53-15.jDhWdhttps://tinypic.host/image/photo-9-2023-09-07-00-53-15.jDJEQhttps://tinypic.host/image/photo-10-2023-09-07-00-53-15.jDRtEhttps://tinypic.host/image/photo-11-2023-09-07-00-53-15.jDk25https://tinypic.host/image/photo-12-2023-09-07-00-53-15.jDrfb[Products will include shipping and handling of physical limited edition 1 of 1 copies for each piece. Price is set @ 8ETH per piece or equivalent in other Cryptocurrencies including Bitcoin. Thank you all very much for checking out this post and I hope you all have a wonderful and prosperous day.Hermez

comments.author: owlcatz
comments.body: Quote from: Hermez11 on September 07, 2023, 05:01:42 AMHi everyone. I'm offering some of my art pieces. Times has changed and trials and tribulations for this starving artist so it's time to release my art to the masses.Products will include shipping and handling of physical limited edition 1 of 1 copies for each piece. Price is set @ 8ETH per piece or equivalent in other Cryptocurrencies including Bitcoin. Thank you all very much for checking out this post and I hope you all have a wonderful and prosperous day.HermezWas trying to resize img tags, but hit post by accident instead of preview. Derp, sorry!
